This is a sticky message!

This channel is used to contact mods publicly for any kind of inquiry, questions,  general help/reports and concerns. Leave your message below and patiently wait for a Mod's response! Please do not chat here unnecessarily : )

**Open a Ticket**
> `!!send`
> Can be used for to contact mods privately and for reports ♡

**Emergency**
> For chat emergency and immediate support, please ping the Mods by using `!!emergency`

• Other ways to report things to us ~> [Read here](https://discord.com/channels/719750112665927791/880180658708807731/1094597179773046904)
• When and why you should report ~> [Read here](https://discord.com/channels/719750112665927791/729187060715356173/1120375186852687872)
